metadata.title: CVE-2024-49911 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Add NULL check for function pointer indcn20_set_output_transfer_funcThis commit adds a null check for the set_output_gamma function pointerin the dcn20_set_output_transfer_func function. Previously,set_output_gamma was being checked for null at line 1030, but then itwas being dereferenced without any null check at line 1048. This couldpotentially lead to a null pointer dereference error if set_output_gammais null.To fix this, we now ensure that set_output_gamma is not null beforedereferencing it. We do this by adding a null check for set_output_gammabefore the call to set_output_gamma at line 1048.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
